targets.expr: sum by(catalyst_node) (avg_over_time(mist_cpu{region=~"${region:pipe}", catalyst_node=~".*${catalyst:pipe}.*"}[180s])) / 10

panels.description: average number of cores used per process. 1.0 -> single CPU core used in 100%

targets.expr: sum by(pod, process, region) (avg_over_time({region!="eu-metrics", region=~"${region:pipe}", app="catalyst", pod=~"${catalyst:pipe}"} |= `[pod-mon]` | regexp `{"process": "MistController", "avg_cpu_per_core": (?P<avg_cpu_per_core>[\d\.]+), "max_cpu_per_core": [\d\.]+, "avg_mem_per_process": [\d\.]+}` | unwrap avg_cpu_per_core [$__auto])) > $treshold
